item.title: We have enough stock for Meningitis B vaccinations at Kapasi Medical. Protect your child today from £90.00
item.description:
We have enough stock for Meningitis B vaccinations at Kapasi Medical. Protect your child today from £90.00

As hundreds of thousands of people sign a petition for the meningitis B vaccine to be given to all children, BBC News asks why it is limited to babies of a certain age - and whether there is enough of it to go round.

item.title: A sign of things to come?
item.description:
A sign of things to come?

Overspending by NHS trusts in England has risen to £2.26bn this year as services struggle to keep control of their finances. The April to December figures mark the three-quarter point of the 2015-16 year - and means the deficit is nearly triple what it was in 2014-15.
